                            ***************************
                            * This is Cape Town news! *
                            ***************************

                WARNING: THE TEXT ONLY VERSION IS NOT THE REAL DEAL!
                ===================================================
Hi Richard

The last text only version of the Cape Town news newsletter was sent out on July 17 2005. After that date, Cape Town news switched to using an html format, which is what you should be viewing right now.

The reason you are not seeing the correct version of Cape Town news, is because your email program isn't capable of or is not configured to display html emails.

I would love you to experience Cape Town news in all it's html glory, so I recommend that you switch to using Mozilla Thunderbird or gmail to manage your mail.

However, if that is not possible for any reason and you'd still like to view the latest Cape Town news newsletter, you can click this link and view it online on a specially built web archive of Cape Town news newsletters:
http://ctnlist.co.za/archive.php?a=57

Here is a very stripped down version of what appears in the HTML version of this email:

~ ~ ~ * ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ * ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ * ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ * ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ * ~ ~ ~
Reach for a Dream Charity Golf Day

March 12 2010

You are invited to attend Reach For A Dream's Golf Day on the 12th of March 2010 at the River Club.

FORMAT:

American Scramble (9 holes)

ENTRY FEE:

R200 per person / R1000 per team of 5 players. Includes gift bag on arrival, game of golf and lunch. We encourage both men and women to sign up.

REGISTRATION:

10h00 to 10h30

TEE-OFF:

"Shotgun start" at 11h00 sharp!!!

LUNCH:

Served from 13h00

AUCTION:

From 15h00.

A "silent auction" option is available for those who are not able to attend. Auction items will be on display on the day or click here to preview the list now.

PLUS:

There will be a "Beat The Pro", "Hole-in-one" and putting competition.

Corporates have the option of branding a hole at R300 each.

For bookings / donation of prize for auction or the gift bags please contact the office on 021 555 3013 or email Genevieve.

VENUE:

The River Club
Liesbeek Parkway, Observatory
Cape Town, Western Cape 7705
Tel: 021 448 6117
~ ~ ~ * ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ * ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ * ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ * ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ * ~ ~ ~

If you would like to subscribe to receive these mailings, click this link:
http://ctnlist.co.za/subscribe.php

If you would like to unsubscribe from these mailings, click this link:
http://ctnlist.co.za/unsubscribe.php?u=fc57b3707d19c808dd64b3986fd60968

If you would like to change your email address, click this link:
http://ctnlist.co.za/subscribe.php?u=fc57b3707d19c808dd64b3986fd60968

If you would like to share this with friends, click this link:
http://ctnlist.co.za/forward.php?u=fc57b3707d19c808dd64b3986fd60968&m=61

If you would like to advertise with in Cape Town news, please contact me.

This newsletter is distributed via http://ctnlist.co.za/, a custom mailing list program written in PHP and MySQL by Richard Catto. Contact me if you would like to use it for your own mailing list.

Cheers,
Richard Catto
ctn editor
Cape Town news
http://capetownnews.co.za/
073 258 8545
http://twitter.com/rrcatto
http://www.facebook.com/rrcatto
--_=_swift-16974649274b7d418c0f44f5.90970824_=_

	</span></span></strong></span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-size: 12px;"><span style="font-family: verdana,geneva,sans-serif;">You are invited to attend Reach For A Dream&#39;s Golf Day on the 12th of March 2010 at the River Club.</span></span></p>
<p>
	<span style="color: steelblue;"><strong><span style="font-size: 22px;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">FORMAT:</span></span></strong></span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-size: 12px;"><span style="font-family: verdana,geneva,sans-serif;">American Scramble (9 holes)</span></span></p>
<p>
	<span style="color: steelblue;"><strong><span style="font-size: 22px;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">ENTRY FEE:</span></span></strong></span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-size: 12px;"><span style="font-family: verdana,geneva,sans-serif;">R200 per person / R1000 per team of 5 players. Includes gift bag on arrival, game of golf and lunch. We encourage both men and women to sign up.</span></span></p>
<p>
	<span style="color: steelblue;"><span style="font-size: 22px;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><strong>REGISTRATION:</strong></span></span></span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-size: 12px;"><span style="font-family: verdana,geneva,sans-serif;">10h00 to 10h30</span></span></p>
<p>
	<span style="color: steelblue;"><strong><span style="font-size: 22px;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">TEE-OFF:</span></span></strong></span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-size: 12px;"><span style="font-family: verdana,geneva,sans-serif;">&quot;Shotgun start&quot; at 11h00 sharp!!!</span></span></p>
<p>
	<span style="color: steelblue;"><span style="font-size: 22px;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><strong>LUNCH:</strong></span></span></span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-size: 12px;"><span style="font-family: verdana,geneva,sans-serif;">Served from 13h00</span></span></p>

			<span style="font-size: 22px;"><strong><span style="color: rgb(70, 130, 180);"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">DUESOUTH XTERRA - FEBRUARY 20 2010</span></span></strong></span></p>
		<p align="center">
			<span style="font-size: 12px;"><span style="font-family: verdana,geneva,sans-serif;">Top South African multi-sport athlete Dan Hugo will return to Grabouw on Saturday, 20 February 2010 with his eye on his second championship title in the DUESOUTH XTERRA finals presented by REHIDRAT&reg;. The 2008 national champion will hit the spectacular Grabouw course in supreme form fresh off his convincing victory at XTERRA Buffelspoort Dam in January.</span></span></p>
		<p align="center">
			<span style="font-size: 12px;"><span style="font-family: verdana,geneva,sans-serif;">Taking place at the Grabouw Country Club, Western Cape. Registration on Wednesday, 17 February and Thursday, 18 February 2010 at DUESOUTH Store (Canal Walk) from 09h00 till 21h00</span></span></p>
		<p align="center">
			<span style="font-size: 12px;"><span style="font-family: verdana,geneva,sans-serif;">For more information, race rules or to enter please contact <a href="http://bit.ly/a2xeml">Stillwater Sport &amp; Entertainment</a> on (021) 883 &ndash; 2413 or <a href="mailto:info@stillwatersports.com">e-mail</a>.</span></span></p>

		<p style="text-align: center;">
			<span style="font-size: 12px;"><span style="font-family: verdana,geneva,sans-serif;">Medical, emotional and financial: as well as picking up the issues psychically, I also use the following to confirm what has come through and the answers you are looking for :- Aspects of Self, Greek Mythology, Oracle Cards, Runes, Numerology, Astrology, Palmistry. I also do Holistic Healing, Deep Tissue Massage, Alignment and Lymph Drainage when a physical shift is required.</span></span></p>
		<p style="text-align: center;">
			<span style="font-size: 12px;"><span style="font-family: verdana,geneva,sans-serif;">Contact Annette on 082 375 5693. </span></span><span style="font-size: 12px;"><span style="font-family: verdana,geneva,sans-serif;">Milnerton.</span></span><span style="font-size: 12px;"><span style="font-family: verdana,geneva,sans-serif;"> <a href="mailto:annetteheals2001@yahoo.co.uk">Email</a> and phone readings also available.<br />
			</span></span></p>
	</div>
	<div style="border: 2px dashed rgb(70, 130, 180); margin: 0px auto 10px; padding: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 800px;">
		<p align="center">
			<span style="font-size: 22px;"><strong><span style="color: rgb(70, 130, 180);"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">QUALIFIED BOOKKEEPER</span></span></strong></span></p>
		<p style="text-align: center;">
			<span style="font-size: 12px;"><span style="font-family: verdana,geneva,sans-serif;">I am a qualified Bookkeeper, with 28 years experience and do books to Trial Balance or Balance Sheet, including Debtors, Creditors, Stock, Petty Cash, Cash Books and Reconciliations and ALL Monthly and Annual Statutory Returns. I use Pastel, IQ and Quickbooks etc. either at your premises, or my offices, on your own Computer or my laptop. I also sell, train and support various Accounting packages.</span></span></p>
		<p style="text-align: center;">
			<span style="font-size: 12px;"><span style="font-family: verdana,geneva,sans-serif;">Contact Annette on 082 375 5693</span></span></p>
	</div>
	<div style="border: 2px dashed rgb(70, 130, 180); margin: 0px auto 10px; padding: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 800px;">
		<p align="center">
			<span style="font-size: 22px;"><strong><span style="color: rgb(70, 130, 180);"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">ACCOUNTING SERVICE</span></span></strong></span></p>
		<p style="text-align: center;">
			<span style="font-size: 12px;"><span style="font-family: verdana,geneva,sans-serif;">Retired Accountant available to assist small and medium sized businesses with bookkeeping and preparation of Final Accounts for audit and taxation purposes. Preparation of budgets, business plan for starting business and yearly or annual projections.<br />
			</span></span></p>
		<p style="text-align: center;">
			<span style="font-size: 12px;"><span style="font-family: verdana,geneva,sans-serif;">Contact Frank 073 075 6961<br />
			</span></span></p>
	</div>
	<div style="border: 2px dashed rgb(70, 130, 180); margin: 0px auto 10px; padding: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 800px;">
		<p align="center">
			<span style="font-size: 22px;"><strong><span style="color: rgb(70, 130, 180);"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><a href="http://bit.ly/dlSgRA">HOME911 - USE YOUR CELLPHONE TO PROTECT YOURSELF</a></span></span></strong></span></p>
		<p style="text-align: center;">
			<span style="font-size: small;"><span style="font-family: Verdana;">Turn your cellphone into a personal panic button with the Home911 service. At the touch of a speeddial number, Home911 connects you to up to 10 family and friends to alert them to the fact that you need emergency assistance.</span></span></p>
		<p style="text-align: center;">
			<span style="font-size: small;"><span style="font-family: Verdana;">To find out more, please contact Joseph Strydom on 082 887 7286 or go directly to the&nbsp;</span></span><a href="http://bit.ly/dlSgRA"><span style="font-size: small;"><span style="font-family: Verdana;">web site</span></span></a><span style="font-size: small;"><span style="font-family: Verdana;">&nbsp;to sign up.</span></span></p>
	</div>
	<div style="border: 2px dashed rgb(70, 130, 180); margin: 0px auto 10px; padding: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 800px;">
		<p align="center">
			<span style="font-size: 22px;"><strong><span style="color: rgb(70, 130, 180);"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">HOUSE SITTING SERVICE - BERGVLIET / CONSTANTIA AREA</span></span></strong></span></p>
		<p style="text-align: center;">
			<font face="Verdana" size="3"><font face="Verdana" size="2">Reliable mature married couple available to house sit, look after pets, plants and domestic staff while you are away. Reasonable daily rate. References available.</font></font></p>
		<p style="text-align: center;">
			<font face="Verdana" size="3"><font face="Verdana" size="2">Contact Liz on 021 715 6820</font></font></p>

		<p>
